page.title: 16Employment
page.content: We noticed from our investigations of the area that the majority of houses had been built during the last {20 years. }As there is{no local {industry}we thought that most people probably worked some way away from home, and had moved into the area because of their job. We devised a {questionnaire,}and were surprised when the results showed that only{37%}of the people asked moved into this area for their job. However, the other results confirmed our thoughts that {Little Sandhurst}could really be called{'commuter belt'. 90%}of the people travel to work by{car}and{37% work more that{20 miles}from home. Only{7%}of people worked within what they described as "walking distance" from home. Only{3%}of those who replied used the{train}to get to work.
